listitem.para: enum BMI088ErrState : uint8_t { kBMI088ErrStateNoErr = 0u , kBMI088ErrStateAccNotFound = 1u << 0 , kBMI088ErrStateGyroNotFound = 1u << 1 , kBMI088ErrStateAccSelfTestFailed = 1u << 2 , kBMI088ErrStateGyroSelfTestFailed = 1u << 3 , kBMI088ErrStateAccConfigErr = 1u << 4 , kBMI088ErrStateGyroConfigErr = 1u << 5 }

enum BMI088AccOdr : uint8_t { kBMI088AccOdr12_5 = 0x5 , kBMI088AccOdr25 = 0x6 , kBMI088AccOdr50 = 0x7 , kBMI088AccOdr100 = 0x8 , kBMI088AccOdr200 = 0x9 , kBMI088AccOdr400 = 0xA , kBMI088AccOdr800 = 0xB , kBMI088AccOdr1600 = 0xC }

enum BMI088GyroOdrFbw : uint8_t { kBMI088GyroOdrFbw2000_532 = 0x0 , kBMI088GyroOdrFbw2000_230 = 0x1 , kBMI088GyroOdrFbw1000_116 = 0x2 , kBMI088GyroOdrFbw400_47 = 0x3 , kBMI088GyroOdrFbw200_23 = 0x4 , kBMI088GyroOdrFbw100_12 = 0x5 , kBMI088GyroOdrFbw200_64 = 0x6 , kBMI088GyroOdrFbw100_32 = 0x7 }
